controls.title: Identity and Access Management Policy and Procedures
controls.description: Implement strong identity and access management controls for AWS Batch resources with proper governance and procedures

implementation.description: Define IAM roles and policies in CloudFormation/Terraform templates with least privilege access to Batch resources, including service-linked roles and cross-service access policies

controls.title: Data Security and Information Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Ensure proper data classification and protection for data processed in Batch jobs throughout the data lifecycle

implementation.description: Implement data encryption at rest and in transit, classify data sensitivity levels, apply appropriate security controls, and establish data retention and disposal procedures

controls.title: Encryption and Key Management Policy and Procedures
controls.description: Implement proper encryption key management policies and procedures for Batch resources

implementation.description: Use AWS KMS for encryption key management with proper key rotation policies, enable encryption for EBS volumes and S3 buckets used by Batch, and implement key access controls

controls.title: Infrastructure and Virtualization Security Policy and Procedures
controls.description: Secure the underlying infrastructure and compute environments for Batch with documented security procedures

implementation.description: Configure secure compute environments with proper security groups, subnets, instance types in infrastructure templates, and implement infrastructure security baselines

controls.title: Governance and Risk Management
controls.description: Implement governance and risk management framework for AWS Batch deployments

implementation.description: Establish governance policies, risk assessment procedures, and compliance monitoring for Batch workloads

controls.title: Account Management
controls.description: Manage AWS Batch service accounts, user accounts, and access permissions with proper lifecycle management

implementation.description: Implement automated account provisioning, management, and deprovisioning through IAM roles and policies defined in infrastructure code with regular access reviews

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information to and from Batch compute environments

implementation.description: Enable TLS/SSL encryption for all API communications and data transfers to/from Batch resources, implement certificate management and validation

controls.title: Protection of Information at Rest
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of information at rest in Batch storage systems

implementation.description: Configure EBS volume encryption and S3 bucket encryption in infrastructure templates for Batch storage with appropriate encryption algorithms and key management

controls.title: Event Logging
controls.description: Identify and log auditable events in AWS Batch systems

implementation.description: Enable CloudTrail for API logging and CloudWatch for operational logging of Batch activities with comprehensive event coverage and retention policies

controls.title: System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor AWS Batch systems for attacks, intrusions, and unauthorized activities

implementation.description: Implement CloudWatch monitoring, AWS Security Hub, and GuardDuty for continuous security monitoring with appropriate alerting and response procedures

controls.title: Baseline Configuration
controls.description: Develop, document, and maintain baseline configurations for Batch compute environments

implementation.description: Define and maintain standardized compute environment configurations using infrastructure as code templates with version control and change management

controls.title: Batch compute environments should use EC2 instances with IMDSv2
controls.description: Configure Batch compute environments to use EC2 instances with Instance Metadata Service version 2

implementation.description: Set httpTokens to 'required' and httpPutResponseHopLimit appropriately in launch templates used by Batch compute environments

controls.title: Batch job definitions should not have privileged mode enabled
controls.description: Ensure Batch job definitions do not run containers in privileged mode

implementation.description: Set privileged parameter to false in containerProperties of job definitions

controls.title: Batch compute environments should be in a VPC
controls.description: Deploy Batch compute environments within a VPC for network isolation

implementation.description: Configure subnets parameter in compute environment definitions to deploy instances in private subnets

controls.title: Batch job definitions should not have elevated privileges
controls.description: Job definitions should not grant unnecessary elevated privileges to containers

implementation.description: Configure job definitions with minimal required privileges and avoid privileged mode, readonlyRootFilesystem should be true

controls.title: Batch compute environments should have detailed monitoring enabled
controls.description: Enable detailed monitoring for Batch compute environments

implementation.description: Set instanceRole and enable detailed monitoring in compute environment launch templates

controls.title: Batch job definitions should specify resource limits
controls.description: Define appropriate CPU and memory limits for Batch jobs

implementation.description: Specify vcpus and memory parameters in job definition containerProperties to prevent resource exhaustion

controls.title: Batch compute environments should use encryption for EBS volumes
controls.description: Enable EBS encryption for compute environment storage

implementation.description: Configure encrypted EBS volumes in launch templates used by Batch compute environments

controls.title: Use Spot Instances for Fault-Tolerant Workloads
controls.description: Leverage EC2 Spot Instances in Batch compute environments for significant cost savings on fault-tolerant workloads

implementation.description: Configure bidPercentage and allocationStrategy in compute environment to use Spot instances with diversified instance types

controls.title: Implement Auto Scaling and Right-Sizing
controls.description: Use managed compute environments with auto scaling to automatically adjust capacity based on job queue demand

implementation.description: Set appropriate minvCpus, maxvCpus, and desiredvCpus in managed compute environments for optimal scaling

controls.title: Optimize Instance Types and Families
controls.description: Select appropriate EC2 instance types based on workload characteristics to optimize cost-performance ratio

implementation.description: Analyze job resource requirements and specify optimal instance types in compute environment instanceTypes parameter

controls.title: Implement Job Queue Prioritization
controls.description: Use job queue priorities to ensure critical jobs run first and optimize resource utilization

implementation.description: Configure priority values for job queues and implement job scheduling strategies to maximize throughput

controls.title: Enable Cost Allocation Tags
controls.description: Implement comprehensive tagging strategy for cost tracking and allocation across different teams or projects

implementation.description: Define consistent tagging strategy in infrastructure templates for all Batch resources including compute environments and job queues

controls.title: Optimize Storage Costs
controls.description: Use appropriate storage types and lifecycle policies for temporary and persistent data

implementation.description: Configure S3 storage classes, lifecycle policies, and use appropriate EBS volume types for different data access patterns

controls.title: Implement Resource Monitoring and Alerting
controls.description: Set up monitoring and alerting for cost anomalies and resource utilization

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch billing alarms, AWS Cost Explorer, and AWS Budgets to monitor and alert on Batch costs
